header.name: chaos/preprocessor/extended/reverse_cat.h
header.author: Paul Mensonides
header.overview: The header defines concatenation macros that reverse their operands prior to concatenation.

macro.abstract: The macro concatenates its arguments after they have been expanded.

usage.param: The right operand of the concatenation.
The left operand of the concatenation.
The right operand of the concatenation.
The left operand of the concatenation.

macro.para:
This macro behaves identically to except that it concatenates the rightmost preprocessing token of a to the leftmost preprocessing token of b or __VA_ARGS__.
__VA_ARGS__ ## a // C99 b ## a // C and C++
